info.description: API to create, update and manage various types of bank issued guarantees and their associated status and details. Some of the types of guarantees that can be created are bid bonds, performance bonds and Trade Finance shipping guarantees
info.title: Management of Guarantees

get.description: Retrieves the guarantee clause details of specific id

parameters.name: clauseId
parameters.description: Represents id of MD.CLAUSES. Id can be used in MD application and description is automatically populated in the deal.Records created for customer specific clauses, to have ID beginning with the customer ID followed by the alpha numeric text.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

post.description: Creates the guarantee clause record for a specific customer

parameters.name: clauseId
parameters.description: Represents id of MD.CLAUSES. Id can be used in MD application and description is automatically populated in the deal.Records created for customer specific clauses, to have ID beginning with the customer ID followed by the alpha numeric text.

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

options.description: The usable options for the override

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

beneficiaryIds.description: Indicates the Id of beneficiary when beneficiary details are stored

beneficiaryId.description: Indicates the Id of beneficiary when beneficiary details are stored

guarantees.description: Specifies the terms and conditions of the guarantee.

guaranteeDetails.description: Specifies the terms and conditions of the guarantee.

guaranteeDetail.description: Specifies the terms and conditions of the guarantee.

supportDocument.description: Holds the file name of the attached/uploaded documents.

documentName.description: Holds the file name of the attached/uploaded documents.

limits.description: Specifies the reason for request of the guarantee when the system prompts that the limit is exceeded.

limitExceedReasons.description: Specifies the reason for request of the guarantee when the system prompts that the limit is exceeded.

limitExceedReason.description: Specifies the reason for request of the guarantee when the system prompts that the limit is exceeded.

messageFromBanks.description: Field to input queries/clarifications by bank to be sought from Corporate customer on the request.

messageFromBank.description: Field to input queries/clarifications by bank to be sought from Corporate customer on the request.

messageFromCustomers.description: Field to input any additional information/clarifications to be provided to the bank, by Corporate customer.

messageFromCustomer.description: Field to input any additional information/clarifications to be provided to the bank, by Corporate customer.

otherInformation.description: Field to input any information that needs to be provided with regard to the issuance of guarantee.

amendmentDetail.description: Field to corporate user to input the amendment details of the guarantee in this field.

overrides.description: The override message is captured  that was generated at the time of commitment of the transaction to the database.

override.description: The override message is captured  that was generated at the time of commitment of the transaction to the database.

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

principalAmount.description: Indicates the Principal Amount of the loan or a deposit

startDate.description: Contains the date on which the transaction or payment gets initiated.

maturityDate.description: Indicates maturity date of the contract

categoryName.description: Name that is displayed for the product category

clientReference.description: To specify the Corporate customer's reference.

chargeDebitAccountId.description: Specifies the account from which charges is to be collected.

provisionDebitAccountId.description: Specifies the account from which the cash margin/provision is to be taken.

commissionDebitAccountId.description: Specifies the account from which the commission is to be collected.

invocationDebitAccountId.description: Specifies the account from which the invocation amount is to be debited at the time of settlement of the claim.

issuedShippingGuaranteeType.description: Specifies whether the request is for issuance of shipping guarantee under Letter of Credit or Documentary collections.

letterOfCreditId.description: Specifies the LC reference under which the shipping guarantee has been requested.

eventStatus.description: Specifies the status of the request.Allowed values are - With Bank_With Customer_Approved_Rejected.

additionalInformation.description: Additional Information provided to add context

amendmentStatus.description: Specifies the status of the amendment request. Allowed values are - With Bank_With Customer_Approved_Rejected.

principalMovement.description: Specifies the amount for which the guarantee request is placed. User input field.

movementDate.description: To specify the date from which the increase/decrease of the guarantee amount is effective.

newExpireDate.description: To specify the new end date of the guarantee during amendment.

invocationStatus.description: Indicates the status of Invocation received under a guarantee.  Allowed values: - PROCESS - EXECUTE - CANCEL

invocationAmount.description: Amount of invocation received under a guarantee

invocationSettleAccountId.description: Specifies the beneficiary(Corporate customer) under a Received guarantee will choose a settlement account into which the invocation amount will be credited.

recordStatus.description: General status of the record. Possible values: - null - authorised - IHLD - input, on hold - INAU - input, not authorised - INA2 - input, authorised, pending second authorisation - INAO - input, not authorised with blocking overrides - RNAU - reversed, not authorised - RNAO - reversed, not authorised with blocking overrides

beneficiaryIds.description: Indicates the Id of beneficiary when beneficiary details are stored

beneficiaryId.description: Indicates the Id of beneficiary when beneficiary details are stored

guaranteeDetail.description: Specifies the terms and conditions of the guarantee.

messageFromBank.description: Field to input queries/clarifications by bank to be sought from Corporate customer on the request.

BeneficiaryIds.description: Indicates the Id of beneficiary when beneficiary details are stored

beneficiaryId.description: Indicates the Id of beneficiary when beneficiary details are stored

BeneficiaryAddresses.description: The address of the Beneficiary if the customer number of the Beneficiary is not known

BeneficiaryAddress.description: The address of the Beneficiary if the customer number of the Beneficiary is not known

increaseDecreaseAmount.description: The field to change the principal movement over the lifetime of the deal

effectiveDate.description: The date on which the principal movement is effected

marginToBeReleased.description: The amount to be released under syndication when there is negative principal movement

amendmentInformation.description: Free format field to allow input of any extra information about the deal

guaranteeDetail.description: Specifies the terms and conditions of the guarantee.

ibClaimNarrative.description: Field to input queries or instructions to the CIB customer while processing an invocation claim under a guarantee issued

charges.description: The charges or fees for this transaction

chargeDate.description: The date on which the charge will be debited to the charge account

chargeCurrency.description: Indicates the currency code of the charge account from where the fee is deducted

debitChargeAccount.description: The account from which the Charges will be debited

chargeCode.description: Indicates the charge code to which the charges are identified and calculated and to be debited to the customer account. For example: C(Credit less Charges The Credit less Charges), D(Debit plus Charge The Debit plus Charge) , W(Waive).

bankAddress.description: Hold the name and address of the RECEIVING.BANK.

detailOfGuarantee.description: This field contains all terms, conditions and details of the guarantee undertaking.

guaranteeReference.description: Another ID for the transaction for retrieval purposes or it can be used for the bank to use a unique guarantee number rather than the system generated ID

customerReference.description: The reference which is provided to the beneficiary/ creditor by the originator of payment

guaranteeType.description: Refers to the type of the contract that is being issued.

productCategoryId.description: The identifier of the product category

currency.description: Identifies the currency. E.g. USD, GBP etc

dealDate.description: Date on which the deal was agreed.

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as an arrangement, product, credit facility or limit is due to expire

maturityDate.description: Indicates maturity date of the contract

limitReference.description: Identifies the credit limit reference for the underlying account.

eventsProcessing.description: Determines whether the principal movements and raising entries will occur Online or at End of Day Allowed values: - ONLINE (default) - END.OF.DAY

autoExpiry.description: Decision field to determine whether the contingent entries are to be reversed after the deal expiry date or not Allowed values: - YES - NO - null (default value, same as NO)

marginToBeTaken.description: Cash Margin to be taken under leaders portion for guarantee issued under syndicated transaction

releaseProvision.description: Flag to enable the online release of the cash margin. Allowed values: - YES - null (default)

releaseAmount.description: The amount of Cash Margin to be released online upon authorization

reinstateContract.description: Indicates whether the Liquidated contracts  to be reinstated or not, Valid option is YES

commissionRecalculationStartDate.description: The date from which the commission is to be recalculated when the contract is reinstated.

adviceRequired.description: Indicates if the advice will be generated for this transaction

contractType.description: Indicates if the position is related to Loan, Deposit ,FX-Forward/FX-Swap

amendmentNumber.description: Indicates the amendment number under the Letter of Credit.

invocationStatus.description: Indicates the status of Invocation received under a guarantee.  Allowed values: - PROCESS - EXECUTE - CANCEL

invocationAmount.description: Amount of invocation received under a guarantee

invocationPaymentMethod.description: The payment methods for invocation claim details.The valid entries are EXTERNAL, INTERNAL or NOSTRO.

invocationDrawdownAccount.description: The Draw down account from where the invocation amount will be debited.

invocationSettleAccount.description: Specifies the beneficiary(Corporate customer) under a Received guarantee will choose a settlement account into which the invocation amount will be credited.

takeMargin.description: Field to check whether provision is to be taken for the transaction or not. YES or NO

marginPercent.description: Field to state the percentage of provision to be taken

marginAmount.description: Actual amount of provision that is debited for the transaction

marginDebitAccount.description: Field to state the account from which the provision amount is to be debited

receivingBank.description: Identifies the counter party Bank to whom the Guarantee message is to be sent when it is an issue of undertaking.

applicableRule.description: Specifies the rules the Letter of credit is subject to. Following are the valid inputs under this field: UCP LATEST VERSION, EUCP LATEST VERSION, UCPURR LATEST VERSION, EUCPURR LATEST VERSION, ISP LATEST VERSION, OTHR. If OTHR is input then, the rule under which credit is subject to must be input in applicable rules description field.

narrative.description: The additional text printed on descriptive statements in addition to the standard narrative and/or reference

furtherIdentification.description: This field identifies the purpose of the guarantee message (ISSUE or REQUEST). Ie to identify if the message conveys the issuance of guarantee from the guarantor or requesting the receiver bank to issue the another guarantee undertaking based on the undertaking received from guarantor.

BeneficiaryIds.description: Indicates the Id of beneficiary when beneficiary details are stored

beneficiaryId.description: Indicates the Id of beneficiary when beneficiary details are stored

BeneficiaryAddresses.description: The address of the Beneficiary if the customer number of the Beneficiary is not known

BeneficiaryAddress.description: The address of the Beneficiary if the customer number of the Beneficiary is not known

increaseDecreaseAmount.description: The field to change the principal movement over the lifetime of the deal

effectiveDate.description: The date on which the principal movement is effected

marginToBeReleased.description: The amount to be released under syndication when there is negative principal movement

limitReference.description: Identifies the credit limit reference for the underlying account.

marginToBeTaken.description: Cash Margin to be taken under leaders portion for guarantee issued under syndicated transaction

releaseProvision.description: Flag to enable the online release of the cash margin. Allowed values: - YES - null (default)

releaseAmount.description: The amount of Cash Margin to be released online upon authorization

reinstateContract.description: Indicates whether the Liquidated contracts  to be reinstated or not, Valid option is YES

commissionRecalculationStartDate.description: The date from which the commission is to be recalculated when the contract is reinstated.

adviceRequired.description: Indicates if the advice will be generated for this transaction

contractType.description: Indicates if the position is related to Loan, Deposit ,FX-Forward/FX-Swap

amendmentNumber.description: Indicates the amendment number under the Letter of Credit.

invocationStatus.description: Indicates the status of Invocation received under a guarantee.  Allowed values: - PROCESS - EXECUTE - CANCEL

invocationAmount.description: Amount of invocation received under a guarantee

invocationPaymentMethod.description: The payment methods for invocation claim details.The valid entries are EXTERNAL, INTERNAL or NOSTRO.

invocationDrawdownAccount.description: The Draw down account from where the invocation amount will be debited.

invocationSettleAccount.description: Specifies the beneficiary(Corporate customer) under a Received guarantee will choose a settlement account into which the invocation amount will be credited.

takeMargin.description: Field to check whether provision is to be taken for the transaction or not. YES or NO

marginPercent.description: Field to state the percentage of provision to be taken

marginAmount.description: Actual amount of provision that is debited for the transaction

marginDebitAccount.description: Field to state the account from which the provision amount is to be debited

receivingBank.description: Identifies the counter party Bank to whom the Guarantee message is to be sent when it is an issue of undertaking.

applicableRule.description: Specifies the rules the Letter of credit is subject to. Following are the valid inputs under this field: UCP LATEST VERSION, EUCP LATEST VERSION, UCPURR LATEST VERSION, EUCPURR LATEST VERSION, ISP LATEST VERSION, OTHR. If OTHR is input then, the rule under which credit is subject to must be input in applicable rules description field.

narrative.description: The additional text printed on descriptive statements in addition to the standard narrative and/or reference

furtherIdentification.description: This field identifies the purpose of the guarantee message (ISSUE or REQUEST). Ie to identify if the message conveys the issuance of guarantee from the guarantor or requesting the receiver bank to issue the another guarantee undertaking based on the undertaking received from guarantor.

beneficiaryCustomerName.description: Specifies the name and address of the beneficiary of the guarantee request.

beneficiaryCustomerId.description: Identifies the Customer who is to be the ultimate receiver of the funds transferred by the sending bank when this Beneficiary is not a bank.

customerStreet.description: Specifies the street name of the beneficiary customer

customerTownCountry.description: Specifies the town country of the beneficiary customer

customerCountry.description: Specifies the country name of the beneficiary customer

beneficiaryCustomerAddress.description: Specifies the address of the beneficiary of the guarantee request.

invocationBeneficiaryId.description: Specifies the name of the beneficiary customer for the guarantee invocation

messageFromBank.description: Field to input queries/clarifications by bank to be sought from Corporate customer on the request.

messageFromCustomer.description: Field to input any additional information/clarifications to be provided to the bank, by Corporate customer.

guaranteeDetail.description: Specifies the terms and conditions of the guarantee.

chargeAccountId.description: Indicates the account to which the charges has to be levied. Used when charges are to be taken from a separate account

commissionAccountId.description: This is the account for paying the commission at the Schedule date.

supportDocument.description: Indicates whether documents supported or not. If the issuance is requested for the shipping guarantee, then Corporate customer can upload supporting documents using the Upload function in CIB.

otherInformation.description: Field to input any information that needs to be provided with regard to the issuance of guarantee.

limitExceedReason.description: Specifies the reason for request of the guarantee when the system prompts that the limit is exceeded.

principalMovement.description: Specifies the amount for which the guarantee request is placed. User input field.

movementEffectiveDate.description: To specify the date from which the increase/decrease of the guarantee amount is effective.

guaranteeId.description: The identifier of the guarantee record.

productType.description: Indicates the product type for the deal.

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

principalAmount.description: Indicates the Principal Amount of the loan or a deposit

alternateId.description: An Alternate Identification for the Deal. This can be used to retrieve the Deal for amendment.

dealDate.description: Date on which the deal was agreed.

maturityDate.description: Indicates maturity date of the contract

externalReference1.description: Any non T24 references which identify the deal for the customer.Free format field to allow input of any customer reference of the deal.

invocationAmount.description: Amount of invocation received under a guarantee

invocationStatus.description: Indicates the status of Invocation received under a guarantee.  Allowed values: - PROCESS - EXECUTE - CANCEL

invocationDebitAccount.description: Specifies the account from which the invocation amount is to be debited at the time of settlement of the claim.

provisionDebitAccount.description: Specifies the account from which the cash margin/provision is to be taken.

internetBankingRequestId.description: Specifies the request id initiated from internet banking

invocationRegisterDate.description: Date on which an invocation claim is registered in the system.

chargeDebitAccountId.description: Specifies the account from which charges is to be collected.

categoryId.description: Unique identifier associated with the product name of the account or contract. For example: For customer/counterparty accounts, the identifier would be in the range 1000 to 9999. For ledger accounts, in the range 10000 to 19999.

externalReference2.description: Any non T24 references which identify the deal for the customer.Free format field to allow input of any customer reference of the deal

issuedShippingGuaranteeType.description: Specifies whether the request is for issuance of shipping guarantee under Letter of Credit or Documentary collections.

lcId.description: Specifies the LC reference under which the shipping guarantee has been requested.

mdIbPrincipalAmountMovement.description: The principal amount of the guarantee request initiated from internet banking

movementDate.description: Specifies the amount for which the guarantee request is placed.

newExpiryDate.description: New Expiry date for presentation under the documentary credit.

categoryName.description: Name that is displayed for the product category

valueDate.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

adviceExpiryDate.description: Specifies the actual expiry date of Guarantee.

amendmentExpiryDate.description: Specifies the amendment expiry date of Guarantee.

alternateTransactionReference.description: An Alternate reference for the Deal. This can be used to retrieve the Deal for amendment.

pendingInvocationClaim.description: Indicates the pending invocation claims for specific customer id

contractType.description: Indicates if the position is related to Loan, Deposit ,FX-Forward/FX-Swap
